title: IO Handler configuration
description: Configuration to setup input and output handlers to the etasl node (e.g. input/output ROS2 topics)

outputhandlers.title: Outputhandlers
outputhandlers.description: Outputhandlers extract data from eTaSL and communicate it in some way to the outside world, such as writing to a file or using a ROS Topic

inputhandlers.title: Inputhandlers
inputhandlers.description: Inputhandlers get information from the outside world and puts it into eTaSL
